protection_autorole_removeall: 当自动角色被删除时删除所有管理权限 (这将保护您免受Discord修改按钮的伤害)
tos_content:
我们对我们网站的条款和条件为客户提供指导，向他们展示如何使用我们的网站以及如何轻松使用其服务。


#第一：ProBot网站的一般条件：-
1-此页面上提及的所有条款和条件都适用于该网站的所有用户。
2-客户在我们的网站上注册后，这意味着他完全同意此页面中提及的条款和条件以及将来可能添加的任何条款。
3-所有客户必须证明他们提供给我们的个人数据正确无误，以便他们可以在网站上注册并获得其服务。
4-我们欢迎所有客户的咨询，我们的技术支持人员随时准备回答客户的所有咨询。
5-我们可以随时更改条款或条件，也可以添加新条款，因此，我们恳请客户不时查看它们，以了解已添加的任何新条款。


#第二：ProBot网站的使用条款：-
1.客户应向我们提供所需的所有信息和数据，且必须100%准确。
2.本网站不对因误用本网站或本网站突然失效而对客户造成的任何损害负责。
3.禁止向他人出售订阅。只有客户端才有权使用机器人。
4.禁止将我们的服务用于未经授权的商业用途。
5-用户保证其使用机器人不会损害我们的网站，也不会违反我们网站的条款和条件。
6-用户保证对其发出的任何违规行为负责，并对该违规行为负责。
7-本网站的管理部门不对客户因滥用本网站而造成的任何损害或损失承担责任。
8-如果参与者违反我们网站的条款和条件，我们的管理部门有权停止其订阅或帐户。

9-禁止在网站外进行交易，任何交易都必须在网站内进行，以免发生任何欺诈和欺骗客户的行为。
10-禁止违反法律使用我们的服务，或对我们的网站或任何其他人造成伤害。


#禁止使用或重用、复制或粘贴ProBot网站上存在的服务或内容，ProBot站点上存在的所有内容均归网站所有，任何违反以上条件的人，将为他自己或他的公司或他的网站或他的应用负责并受到网站管理部门的起诉。
pp_content:
感谢您亲爱的客户阅读我们的隐私政策页面。我们向客户保证，他们的个人数据和信息在我们的网站上将是完全安全的，因为我们负责维护这些数据，并且我们将以各种方式寻求对其进行保存。我们的隐私权政策页面包括以下内容：

1-我们要求客户提供的数据和信息：

ProBot网站要求客户提供一些数据和信息，以便能够在我们的网站上注册并使用其服务，例如，我们的网站要求客户提供他的电子邮件，他的姓名和电话号码，并且他应该在我们的帐户上输入自己的帐户密码本网站可能会要求您提供本网站和其他信息。

2-客户对我们网站的责任：

客户对其在我们网站上的帐户安全负责。他不应向任何人提供有关其帐户的敏感信息，例如向某人提供其帐户密码，这会对客户帐户造成一定的损害。我们建议客户不要将任何私人信息提供给其他人。

3-我们如何保护我们网站中客户的数据：-

我们的网站在全球范围内遵循最佳程序，以保护客户的个人数据和信息。我们的网站向所有客户保证他们的数据将对我们安全。我们的网站符合欧盟保护客户数据（GDPR）的要求。

：-4-客户在我们网站上的财务权利

我们的站点管理热衷于客户的财务权利。余额仅在订单页面上显示给客户。我们的网站不会向任何人提供客户的财务数据

5-我们网站对客户数据的使用：-

当我们获得有用的信息并开发其服务时，我们的站点仅使用客户数据为他们提供服务。当我们回复客户询问时，以及我们进行购买时。

6.我们遵循欧盟的要求来保护我们的客户数据：

欧盟制定了一项法律，可以极大地帮助保护客户数据。我们以各种方式来保存客户数据。该法律允许所有客户在发生数据泄露时删除或修改其数据，并且我们的网站必须在发生此类事件后72小时内报告该数据泄露。

7-我们的网站权利：-

如果我们的管理员认为有必要这样做，则我们的网站拥有随时修改其隐私权政策页面中的任何项目或在其中添加一些新项目的完全权利，因此，尊敬的客户，您应该不时浏览一下。请访问我们的隐私权政策页面，以了解对我们的隐私权政策页面所做的任何更改。

8.本网站的版权：-

严格禁止复制或粘贴，使用或重复使用与ProBot站点相关的任何内容。该站点中存在的任何内容仅属于ProBot站点。任何人复制，粘贴或使用ProBot网站的任何内容或服务；他将使自己或他的网站或他的公司面临责任和网站管理部门的起诉。
rp_content:
我们向所有客户保证，更换和退款过程将在我们这里轻松完成；我们努力工作，以满足所有亲爱的客户。客户可以在购买日期的7天内要求更换服务或退款，条件是：
1- 更换和退款过程只能在向我们购买服务的人身上进行。
2- 必须通过明确的订单号和发票来确认购买。
3- 当客户要求更换时，他必须没有使用购买的机器人。

membership_faq_answer_1: Membership feature provides users with exclusive benefits and privileges that are not available to non-members. Users are typically required to pay a fee to access these benefits, which can be a monthly or yearly subscription.
membership_faq_question_2: Can I transfer my old account data to a new account?
membership_faq_answer_2: 是的，转移功能允许用户每月进行一次旧帐户数据的转移，包括等级和积分。请注意，每月转移功能仅支持黄金会员和钻石会员。
membership_faq_question_3: What types of files are supported for customizing the background?
membership_faq_answer_3: 自定义背景支持的文件类型为 png、jpeg，图像大小不得超过 3MB。
membership_faq_question_4: What payment methods do you accept for membership subscriptions?
membership_faq_answer_4: We accept all major credit and debit cards, including Visa, Mastercard, American Express, and Discover.
membership_faq_question_5: Can I get a refund for my ProBot membership subscription?
membership_faq_answer_5: Yes, refunds are available for ProBot membership subscriptions under certain conditions. Refunds are only available if you have not used any feature beyond the daily credits. If you have used any other feature of your membership, you will not be eligible for a refund. Additionally, refunds can only be requested within 7 days of the initial subscription purchase date.

landing_embed_messages_title: 便捷地为您的服务器嵌入信息
landing_embed_messages_description: Illustrate your creativity in embeds by using ProBot's simple customization and sending it to any preferred channel.

landing_self_assignable_roles_title: React to the messages and get roles!
landing_self_assignable_roles_descriptio: Set up exclusive reaction roles & buttons, select menus, and let your members have the roles they deserve with a single click!
landing_self_assignable_roles_learn: 了解更多关于自定义角色的信息
landing_leveling_system_title: 为您最活跃的成员提供奖励
landing_leveling_system_description: Reward active members with special level roles, privileged permissions, and channels as they reach a certain level!
landing_leveling_system_learn: 了解更多关于等级系统的信息
landing_testimonial_title: 让ProBot来当您的服务器管家
features_welcome_messages_customizable_t: 自定义专属的欢迎文本
features_welcome_messages_customizable_d: Customize your welcome text to perfection with ProBot's simple-to-use variables, as well as the option to send a welcome to a specific channel or user DMs!
features_welcome_messages_backgorund_des: Create your welcome image and upload it to ProBot to show to your newly joined members, with the option to send it with the text message, before the text message, or by itself!
features_welcome_messages_layouts_descri: Customize welcome image layout completely including user avatar's shape, height, width, and coordinates, username width, coordinates, text alignment, and color, and text coordinates, size, width, and color.
features_embed_messages_modify_descripti: Modify your embed messages quickly and easily with ProBot's easy-to-use embed feature, which includes a variety of addable fields, titles, and much more!
features_embed_messages_edit_title: Edit your embed messages at any time you wish
features_embed_messages_edit_description: Have you decided to make a change to a previously sent embed message? Don't be concerned! With the edit send message feature of ProBot, you can select the message you want and make changes. And there you have it, the existing message will be edited!
features_embed_messages_preview_title: Preview your embed message before sending
features_embed_messages_preview_descript: Wondering how your embed message will look before you send it? Don't be concerned! You can see how your embed message will look and have it done flawlessly with ProBot's embed preview!
features_self_assignable_role_press_butt: Press the Button and get the role
Create up to 25 buttons with the ability to change the button emoji, text, color, role mode, notification type, and order!
features_self_assignable_role_select_rol: Select the role you want and get it instantly
Create up to 20 select menus, each with the ability to change the option emoji, title, description, role mode, notification type, and order!
features_self_assignable_role_react_mess: 与指定消息进行反应互动来获取角色身份
Create up to 20 reactions with the option of using custom or standard emojis, as well as the ability to change the role mode, and notification type!
features_leveling_system_leve_type_descr: Add Role Rewards by specifying your preferred level type (text, voice, or both)! With the ability to remove low-level rewards and replace them with higher-level rewards, as well as the ability to notify a user via DMS!
features_leveling_system_no_xp_title: 设置无经验值角色和无经验值频道
features_leveling_system_no_xp_descripti: 可禁止指定角色在您的服务器上获取经验值，以及禁止指定频道获得经验值！
features_leveling_system_level_message_t: Set up the leveling up message channel
features_leveling_system_level_message_d: Set up your leveling channel and personalize your leveling text with our unique variables!
premium_which_plan_title: Which Plan is right for you?
premium_faq_answer_1: A premium bot is a service designed for server owners who want to enhance their servers with advanced features and protection against raiders and vandals. It comes in two tiers, each offering unique sets of features.
premium_faq_question_2: Can I transfer my premium bot subscription to another server?
premium_faq_answer_2: Yes, you can transfer your premium bot subscription to another server. Simply invite the bot to the new server using the same credentials.
premium_faq_question_3: Will I lose my premium features if I switch from one premium tier to another?
premium_faq_answer_3: No, you won't lose your premium features when switching between tiers. Your premium benefits will remain intact throughout the process.
premium_faq_question_4: Can I purchase multiple premium bot subscriptions for different servers?
premium_faq_answer_4: Yes, you can purchase multiple premium bot subscriptions for different servers. Each subscription is valid for one server, so you can enjoy premium benefits across multiple servers by subscribing individually.
premium_faq_question_5: How can I request a refund for my premium bot purchase, and which payment methods are eligible for refunds?
premium_faq_answer_5: To request a refund for your premium bot purchase, please reach out to our support team with the details of your purchase. We offer refunds for purchases made through credit cards and PayPal. Our support team will guide you through the refund process according to our refund policy guidelines.
premium_faq_question_6: What payment methods are accepted for premium bot purchases?
premium_faq_answer_6: We accept all major credit cards from any country worldwide. Additionally, we also support payments through PayPal, offering you the convenience and security of using your PayPal account for your premium bot purchase
